copy.time_to_add_campaign: Hey! Now it’s time to add a campaign. Campaigns are there to help you organize your digital workflow. You can add or edit elements here as well as keep track of how they are doing.
copy.public_page: Your public page is live at:
copy.public_not_live: Your public page is not live yet.
copy.select_campaign: Select which campaign you want to publish from the dropdown below.
copy.hello_new: Hello, it looks like you’re new here. Thanks for signing up and kicking our tires.
copy.how_platform_works_1: The platform works with your own storage, payment, and mailing list accounts. To add connections to your services, open the
copy.how_platform_works_3: , click 'Connections,' and choose the type of account you'd like to connect.
copy.publish_campaign_info: Publishing a campaign sets it live as your public page, using the theme you've set above.
copy.embed_info_1: If you don’t want to publish a page you can embed any element from your campaign anywhere on the web. Simply click the quick embed icon
copy.no_elements: No Elements have been created. Click the +Add button in the campaign window above to create and embed elements on the platform.
copy.no_elements_add_campaign_1: No Elements have been created. You must
copy.no_elements_add_campaign_3: before you can create and embed elements on the platform.
